Query.Sql: select distinct d.DiagnosisICD, apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, apc.NHSNumber, apc.CDSActivityDate from omop_staging.sus_ICDDiagnosis d inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on d.MessageId = apc.MessageId where apc.NHSNumber is not null

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
